code: @Test public void testInvalidStylesheet() throws Exception {     try {         RouteBuilder builder = createRouteBuilder().         CamelContext context = new DefaultCamelContext().         context.addRoutes(builder).         context.start().         fail("Should have thrown an exception due XSL compilation error").     } catch (FailedToCreateRouteException e) {         // expected         assertIsInstanceOf(TransformerConfigurationException.class, e.getCause()).     } }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("seda:a").to("xslt:org/apache/camel/component/xslt/invalid.xsl").         }     }. }
